name: Just Montana Things
description:
GET 'ER DONE! Just Montana things is a survival simulator game based on what it's like to live in the REAL state of Montana! Finally, you can live out your dreams of becoming a professional hunter. Remember to collect elk trophy plaques to hang in your house to impress mama!

Controls:

-Move: WASD                                    -Sprint: LEFT SHIFT

-Aim/Look: MOUSE                           -Jump: SPACE  

-Shoot: LEFT MOUSE                        -Flashlight: F 

 -Pick up: RIGHT MOUSE                  -Pause: ESC

A game by MisterMyst, Melon Lord, and Cheemis
